framework.mipuz.game

Interface Game

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BBGame, MMGame

    public interface Game

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cleanUpGame()
      Game cleaning method that framework calls when it is preparing to shut down application or to clean the game away.
      boolean initGame(GameParameters gameParams)
      Game initialisation method that is called by framework to allow game to make its initialisations required before the game is being run.
      GameInfo retrieveGameInfo()
      Returns an GameInfo object that provides information about a game.
      void runGame()
      The game execution method called by framework.

    • Method Detail

      • retrieveGameInfo

        GameInfo retrieveGameInfo()
        Returns an GameInfo object that provides information about a game.
        Returns:
        The game information

      • initGame

        boolean initGame(GameParameters gameParams)
        Game initialisation method that is called by framework to allow game to make its initialisations required before the game is being run.
        Parameters:
        gameParams - parameters for the game to use to function in given framework
        Returns:
        value that indicates whether initialisation was successful or not. If not then the game is not attempted to execute.

      • runGame

        void runGame()
        The game execution method called by framework.

      • cleanUpGame

        void cleanUpGame()
        Game cleaning method that framework calls when it is preparing to shut down application or to clean the game away. This method is called always if initGame method is called.
